name: Francesca Fleming
what_you_do: Francesca Fleming is a medical intuitive medium and energy practitioner who blends her natural psychic gifts with a grounded practice. Her work brings together insights from the body and soul with practical steps clients can follow at home.
who_you_serve: Clients describe the sessions as accurate, clarifying, and kind.
niche: medical intuition, energy healing, spiritual growth
business_focus: Providing medical intuitive readings, energy healing, and guidance for body, mind, and spirit.
service_provided: medical intuitive readings, energy healing, chakra and aura clearing, nutrition and herb suggestions, homeopathy suggestions, visualization practices
